start.text: Let us get down to business.

start_boss.text: Holy shit, they just don't make them like that anymore!

retreat.text: They told me this ship is fast!
Full burn away from here, I want those engines melting!
Let's get the hell out of here!

out_of_missiles.text: What do you mean my missiles are depleted?
Fire everything! Ah shit, we fired all our missiles already?
I really could use some boomers right about now...

engaged.text: This is a target rich environment.
This party has only just started!

need_help.text: Cycle long free drinks to whoever saves my hide!
I need help over here like yesterday!
This is going to hell in a handbasket!

pursuing.text: Leave no survivors, I want that ship a smoldering wreck!
Kill them! Kill them until they are dead!

running.text: Too hot for comfort over here!
God dammit, we are in over our heads!

hull_90.text: Son of a bitch, just painted this thing last week.
Ah! There goes my drink, what a waste.
My ship is taking damage, but I will return the favor tenfold!

hull_50.text: That last hit just took out the canteen, looks like it's take out.
Is that one of my crew I can see outside the aft window?

hull_30.text: I'm not ready to die yet!
This is it folks, now or never!
I shall find honor in death, just hopefully not today!

overload.text: Who set off sparklers on my bridge!?
My ship's flux just tipped into the red!
The flux capacitors are bleeding out!

victory.text: Heh, look at them scatter like roaches.
Like shooting Volturnian lobster in a barrel.
Haha, tell your friends, this show has only just started!

victory_boss.text: I told you size doesn't matter.
